SEARCH
Package com.dennisturco

Class JsonConfig

java.lang.Object
com.dennisturco.JsonConfig
public class JsonConfig extends Object
A utility class to load and flatten JSON configuration files into a flat key-value map. This class reads a JSON configuration file and flattens nested structures into a single-level HashMap with concatenated keys (e.g., "MenuItems_BugReport"). It supports reloading and accessing individual configuration values by key.

      Returns:
